Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: Melt butter in a skillet over medium-low heat. Crack eggs into the skillet side by side and cook until eggs are white on the bottom layer and firm enough to flip, 2 to 3 minutes. Flip eggs, trying not to crack the yolk, and cook until the egg reaches desired doneness, 2 to 5 minutes more.

Steps.Name: Next step
Steps.Description: Meanwhile, toast bread slices to desired doneness, 3 to 4 minutes.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Meanwhile, toast bread slices to desired doneness, 3 to 4 minutes.

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: Cut all your vegetables to size

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: Place the dressing ingredients in a jar and shake together until well combined

Steps.Name: Third step
Steps.Description: Add the mix salad greens first, then strategically place the carrot, onion, red pepper and cucumber around the mixed greens.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Finish up with the dressing. Add the dressing just before you want to serve the salad otherwise it'll go soggy.

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: Whenever I have fresh spinach in the house, I love wilting it into the sauce during the final few minutes of cooking to add some greens to this dish.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: If you happy to have any other Italian herbs in the house (rosemary, oregano, thyme, etc), feel free to add them in to taste

Steps.Name: Third step
Steps.Description: Instead of (or — if you’re feeling extra-indulgent — in addition to) the heavy cream, add in a torn ball of fresh burrata to the dish just before serving. I can vouch that it is heavenly.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: I have to admit that I really prefer the texture/flavor of this dish using fresh tomatoes. But if you’re in a pinch, it will also taste great using one large (28-ounce) can of good-quality whole tomatoes, which you can break up with a wooden spoon as they cook.

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 10 to 12 minutes; rinse under cold water and drain.

Steps.Name: Next step
Steps.Description: Whisk Italian dressing and salad spice mix together until smooth

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Combine pasta, tomatoes, bell peppers, and olives in a salad bowl; pour dressing over salad and toss to coat. Refrigerate salad, 8 hours to overnight.

Name: Circle Cake

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt in a bowl, mixing well.

Steps.Name: Second
Steps.Description: Place the butter and sugar in the bowl of a heavy-duty mixer fitted with the paddle attachment and beat on medium speed for about 5 minutes, or until very soft and light. Beat in the vanilla.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Bake the layers for about 30 to 35 minutes, until they are well risen and firm and a toothpick inserted in the center emerges clean. Cool the layers in the pans on racks for 5 minutes, then unmold onto racks to finish cooling right side up.

Details: Impressive with a very fancy form

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: In the bowl of a stand mixer or in a large bowl (using a hand mixer) add cream cheese and stir until smooth and creamy (don’t over-beat or you’ll incorporate too much air).

Steps.Name: First step
Steps.Description: Add sugar and stir again until creamy

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: Add sour cream, vanilla extract, and salt, and stir until well-combined. If using a stand mixer, make sure you pause periodically to scrape the sides and bottom of the bowl with a spatula so that all ingredients are evenly incorporated

Steps.Name: Third step
Steps.Description: With mixer on low speed, gradually add lightly beaten eggs, one at a time, stirring just until each egg is just incorporated. Once all eggs have been added, use a spatula to scrape the sides and bottom of the bowl again and make sure all ingredients are well combined.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Transfer to the center rack of your oven and bake on 325F (160C) for about 75 minutes. Edges will likely have slightly puffed and may have just begun to turn a light golden brown and the center should spring back to the touch but will still be Jello-jiggly. Don't over-bake or the texture will suffer, which means we all suffer.

Name: Fluffy French Toast

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: Measure flour into a large mixing bowl. Slowly whisk in milk. Whisk in eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and salt until smooth.

Steps.Name: First step
Steps.Description: Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium heat.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: Soak bread slices in milk mixture until saturated.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Working in batches, cook bread on the preheated griddle or pan until golden brown on each side. Serve hot.

Details: Good to have a pretty nice breakfast

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: Bring the milk and water to a boil in a pot.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: Mix in the oats, and reduce heat to medium. Stir in blueberries, applesauce, wheat germ, cinnamon, and sugar.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Cook 8 to 10 minutes, or until oats are tender.

Name: Walnut and nuts

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: In a bowl, combine flour and sugar.

Steps.Name: Second Step
Steps.Description: Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Combine egg yolks and milk; stir into flour mixture until blended. With lightly floured hands, press dough onto the bottom and 1 in. up the sides of a 12-in. tart pan with removable bottom. Line unpricked crust with a double thickness of heavy-duty foil. Fill with pie weights. Place pan on a baking sheet. Bake at 375° until edges are lightly browned, 12-15 minutes.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Meanwhile, in a saucepan, combine the sugar, cream, cinnamon and salt. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly. Remove from the heat; stir in walnuts. Remove foil from crust; pour filling into crust. Bake until golden brown, 20-25 minutes. Cool on a wire rack. Store in the refrigerator.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Walnuts recipe to get very taste dessert

Name: Avocado Salad

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: In a small mixing bowl whisk together lemon juice, red wine vinegar, extra virgin oil oil, honey, garlic.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: After whisk, to get better taste pour cilantro, parsley, oregano, and season with salt and pepper.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: In a large bowl gently toss together cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, avocado with dressing.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Avocado salad recipe is a very healthy meal to loss weight

Name: Croissants

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: Twenty-four hours before serving, start the détrempe: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook, combine the flour, sugar, salt and yeast, and stir to combine.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: Create a well in the center, and pour in the water and milk. Mix on low speed until a tight, smooth dough comes together around the hook, about 5 minutes. Remove the hook and cover the bowl with a damp towel. Set aside for 10 minutes.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Reattach the dough hook and turn the mixer on medium-low speed. Add the butter pieces all at once and continue to mix, scraping down the bowl and hook once or twice, until the dough has formed a very smooth, stretchy ball that is not the least bit sticky, 8 to 10 minutes.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Crossiant recipe to get very taste after lunch

Name: Strawberry Cream Pie

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description: In a medium bowl, mix together 1 1/2 cups of all-purpose flour and 1/2 cup of cold butter.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: Use a fork or pastry cutter to blend the butter into the flour until it resembles coarse crumbs. Slowly add in 1/4 cup of ice water, 1 tablespoon at a time, and mix until the dough comes together. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to fit your pie dish and press it into the bottom and up the sides. Prick the crust all over with a fork and preheat the oven to 375F. Bake the crust for 15-20 minutes, or until lightly golden brown.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: In a medium saucepan, mix together 1 cup of heavy cream, 1/2 cup of granulated sugar, and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract. Heat the mixture over medium heat, whisking constantly, until it comes to a simmer. In a small bowl, mix together 2 tablespoons of cornstarch and 2 tablespoons of cold water to make a slurry. Slowly pour the slurry into the saucepan and continue to whisk until the mixture thickens. Remove from heat and stir in 2 cups of sliced strawberries. Pour the filling into the cooled crust and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Strawberry Cream Pie recipe is an awusome dessert to eat in any moment

Name: Teriyaki Salmon

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description: Combine sauce ingredients and stir until brown sugar is dissolved.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: Place individual salmon slices in a mixing bowl. Pour the sauce over the salmon, cover with plastic wrap and let marinate 20 minutes (at room temp or refrigerated).

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Transfer salmon to prepared baking sheet (keep the marinade). Bake at 400 for 12-16 minutes or until salmon is flaky and cooked through, bake times may vary by thickness and cut of salmon (see notes on how long to bake salmon below).

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Teriyaki Salmon is a high protein food with lots of nutrients

Name: Air Fryer French Fries

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description: We just wash the potatoes and keep the skins on, but you can peel if you prefer.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: Clean the potatoes and cut into about 1/4 inch strands, making sure all the strands are the same size for even cooking. Rinse the fries under cold water and pat dry.

Steps.Name: Third step
Steps.Description: Add the fries into a bowl and drizzle with oil and toss, season and toss again. Evenly spread the fries into the air fryer basket.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Cook the fries until crispy and golden, tossing half way.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Air Fryer French Fries is a delicious plate and more healthy that normal fries

Name: Hasselback Potatoes

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description: Preheat the oven to 425ºF

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: Set a potato on a cutting board and place a chopstick on either side of the potato. With a sharp, thin knife, make deep vertical cuts 1/8-inch apart, but without cutting all the way through the potato. The chopsticks should keep you from accidentally cutting too deeply or going all the way through.

Steps.Name: Third step
Steps.Description: Place the potatoes with the cut side up in the baking dish, spaced a little apart so each one has some room. Fan the potatoes open slightly.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Or until golden and crispy. The potatoes will fan out more during cooking and take on their accordion-like appearance. Serve hot.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Hasselback Potatoes is a delicious plate
